I have been able to quote this entire scene (and really the whole movie) since I was 12. I still laugh every damn time.

What's the matter colonel sanders? Chicken?
Damn hype! I am meant to be working, and all I am doing is browsing the forums!

> 
> Any decent HypeTrain would be embarrassed to go at any speed lower than plaid.

Plaid is really hard to build up to, jeez. Plaid means we're going so fast that *we're moving orthagonally to spacetime.* It takes a long gitme to do this. We're gonna breakthrough at approximately T-2 days. You have to accept this speed.

To keep hype going, what are all of you going to do with resources?

I'm hyped to make a space station in a super-low mun orbit for mining planetary resources!

> 
> To keep hype going, what are all of you going to do with resources?
> I'm hyped to make a space station in a super-low mun orbit for mining planetary resources!

I have no clue, I am hyped to find out what I will do! Probably explore the Mun like crazy and figure out how it works and how it can help me build smaller more efficient craft to get to the other planets and back. Super hyped to find out.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ygE01sOhzz0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My brains are going into my feet!

Hype. 

Hypenado. 'nuff said. 

Hypersaurus rex. It senses hype. and movement.

Hyperdrive. just not fast enough.

Hyperthermia. REENTRY TOO FAASSSTTTTT

Hyperpotamus. Huge amount of hype.

Hyperactive hype disorder. HHD. We all have this.

And last but not least,

Hyperphobia. To those too scared to join the hype train, I'm so sorry.

**To hypen**

*verb* hyÃ‚Â·pen \Ã‹Ë†hÃ„Â«-pÃ‰â„¢n, -p^Ã‰â„¢^m\

Definitions: 

1- The occurrence of something that was highly expected/anticipated by persons traveling at an unimaginable velocity in a Hype Train.

Examples: 

"They released a new video preview of the KSP 1.0 update! The hype is real and is hypening in front of our eyes!!!"

 "KSP 1.0 update will be released today! It's hypening!!!!"

"Do you remeber when KSP 1.0 update was released and Google crashed due to the amount of network traffic? It hypened so fast!!!"

Related words: Hype Train, Fappening

I'm so hyped, but I'm bored at school and my hype has no vent, so I have to keep posting here. 

H

Y

P

E

!!!

We seem to be making anywhere between 10-15 pages a day right now. 

LET'S MAKE 100!
only 8 more pages until 100 and 13 pages until we break the lowest hype thread's page count. Onwards!

WOOO! This is my 1000th post and It's on the 1.0 hype train! 

Whew, been looking forward to this moment for a loooong time... \*sheds tear\*

> 
> WOOO! This is my 1000th post and It's on the 1.0 hype train! 
> Whew, been looking forward to this moment for a loooong time... \*sheds tear\*

I missed mine. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) I posted a thread as my 1000th post, a great thread idea...then I realized that there was a HUGE thread exactly like it and I had actually posted on it before. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

So i had to have it deleted, but since I had to post to get it deleted i was already over 1k. Oh well, I won't miss 2k for sure. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

... and upwards!

I will be Away From Keyboard all weekend long, and won't be able to contribute to the HYPE in that time.

But, when I get back there will be a HYPETASTIC surprise waiting for me - KSP 1.0!

Approaching the leg-jiggling-hype-level, refusing to fire up KSP again until Monday ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) 4.5 days to decide whether to immediately start with a new career, or sandbox around with the new aero until my fave mods catch up...

> 
> Approaching the leg-jiggling-hype-level, refusing to fire up KSP again until Monday ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) 4.5 days to decide whether to immediately start with a new career, or sandbox around with the new aero until my fave mods catch up...

I must launch KSP - if only to capture footage for Korbital Mechanics 101 - Lesson Two: Kepler's Second Law of Planetary Motion

EDIT: Forgot to mention - I have acute restless leg syndrome myself for 1.0.

The nose cones ablative shielding has worn off, i am i using only my hype will to protect you guys from the plasma you are causing with this hype speed. Happy hyping!
